backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Product and CartItem types, hardcoded product catalog (8 items), and query/update methods for fetching products, managing per-caller shopping carts (getCart, addToCart).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that ProductGrid.tsx was updated to display all new products in the existing responsive grid layout without modifying grid structure or styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, plus global resets for body and border styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title "HIZE", root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app with CartProvider and rendering Navigation, Hero, ProductGrid, About, and Footer in sequence.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component displaying HIZE philosophy story with campaign image and three value pillars (Sourcing, Ethics, Intent) in responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Sliding cart overlay component showing cart items with product details, quantities, remove buttons, total price calculation, and checkout button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with HIZE branding, social/legal links, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with 90vh height, "Summer Uniform '26" heading, tagline, hero background image, and smooth-scroll CTA button to shop section.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with HIZE logo, smooth-scroll links (Shop, About, Journal), dynamic bag counter button, and Cart overlay integration.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component displaying product image, name, price, and "Add to Bag" button with loading state and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Product grid section fetching products from CartContext, mapping product names to image URLs (including four new items), and rendering ProductCard components in responsive grid with "New Arrivals" header.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context provider for cart state management, providing cart items, count, open/close state, and methods to add/remove items and refresh cart data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance using React Query, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook for managing user login/logout state, identity delegation, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching products and cart items from the backend actor, with proper dependency management on actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, plus base styles for HTML elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH variables, typography, container queries, animations, and responsive breakpoints for the design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a minimalist e-commerce site for HIZE fashion brand, listing architectural decisions, known issues, required placeholder images, and implemented features.
